 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּנִינִים‎</span> **noun [feminine] plural** ==corals== (? as ***branching*** compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***branch*** of tree; so [[BDB#JDMich|Mich]] [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others; &gt; ***pearls*** [[BDB#Bo|Bo]]<sup>Hieroz. 601</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>Jb</sup> after [[BDB#Ra|Ra]] and others); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> figurative of value [[Prov.20.15|Prov 20:15]] usually <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִפּ‎</span>, camp. [[Job.28.18|Job 28:18]]; [[Prov.3.15|Prov 3:15]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מפניים‎</span>), [[Prov.8.11|Prov 8:11]]; [[Prov.31.10|Prov 31:10]] (all of value), [[Lam.4.7|Lam 4:7]] (of red colour); + [[Ps.45.14|Ps 45:14]] (perhaps; for  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּנִימָה‎</span>, q. v. ).
